name: Paxillia
description:
A story-driven pong/breakout game. Yup, taht's a thing.

Find Rolly! Help your friends along the way. And convince grandma you're not hungry!

Us the mouse to move around, left-click to serve a ball.

This is my first game in Unity, so I kind of didn't know what I was doing :) Any feedback and ideas are appreciated.

https://discord.gg/FjNGaAwy

Downloading the Windows build may give you more responsive controls, though the web version should work fine as well.
